  • Sprite

Class Sprite

This class represents a sprite object, which plays a sequence of frames from a SpriteSheet instance.

Code example:

 const sprite = new Sprite();
 const spriteSheet = {
   width: 480,
   height: 400,
   url: "./elephant.png",
   fps: 20,
   frames: []
 };
 for (let i = 0; i < 34; ++i) {
   opt.frames.push({ x: 0, y: 400 * i });
 }
 sprite.setSpriteSheet(spriteSheet).play();

    • Sprite
